com.tsgrp.migration.event.log

Class NthCommandExecutorListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tsgrp.migration.event.AbstractListener
      • com.tsgrp.migration.event.log.NthCommandExecutorListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PostUpdateLogItemEventListener

    public class NthCommandExecutorListener
extends AbstractListener
implements PostUpdateLogItemEventListener
    Keeps track of nodes and executes an action after the count of nodes reaches an injected threshold. Currently configured to execute a command, after a certain # of successful nodes. Could potentially implement other interfaces in order to execute commands at different milestones of a migration.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int executionCounter
      Integer value that counts the number of times a command is executed over the course of the migration.
      protected int succesfulNodeCounter
      Keeps track of successful nodes, reset each time the command is executed.
